name: Adventure
description: A genre featuring exciting and unusual experiences.

name: Landscape
description: A genre of art depicting landscapes.

name: Fantasy
description: A genre involving imaginative or fanciful elements.

name: Rock
description: A genre of popular music that originated as 'rock and roll' in the United States.

name: Programming
description: A genre related to writing instructions for computers.

name: Pop
description: A genre of popular music that originated in its modern form during the mid-1950s.

name: Post-Impressionism
description: A genre of painting that rejected the naturalism of impressionism.

name: Technology
description: A genre related to the application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes.

name: Science Fiction
description: A genre of speculative fiction dealing with imaginative concepts.

name: Nature
description: A genre of art depicting nature and its features.

name: Action
description: A genre of fiction, including films, that emphasizes physical activity.
